text: Metopivaria brunnea is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1923, originally under the genus Heteroclytomorpha.BioLib.cz - Metopivaria. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Homonoeini Category:Beetles described in 1923
title: Metopivaria brunnea
